keyword: how many calories in a sausage mcmuffin
title: How Many Calories in a Sausage McMuffin?
meta_description: Discover how many calories in a sausage mcmuffin, including full nutrition breakdown, macros, and variations for this McDonald's breakfast item.
h1: How Many Calories in a Sausage McMuffin?
assumptions: McDonald's Sausage McMuffin: pork sausage patty, English muffin, American cheese; standard recipe, no additions.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by brand, location, recipe changes, and customizations. Check McDonald's app or packaging for latest values.

quick_answer.text: A Sausage McMuffin provides about 400 kcal, with 14 g protein and 25 g fat.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison with packaging.

faqs.q: How many calories in a Sausage McMuffin with egg?
faqs.a: About 480 kcal for the version with added fried egg.

faqs.q: What are the macros for a sausage mcmuffin?
faqs.a: Approximately 29 g carbs, 14 g protein, 25 g fat per sandwich.

faqs.q: Is the Sausage McMuffin high in sodium?
faqs.a: Yes, around 780 mg sodium, about 34% of daily recommended intake.

faqs.q: How does homemade compare to McDonald's sausage mcmuffin calories?
faqs.a: Homemade can vary; leaner sausage or whole-grain muffin may reduce to 300-350 kcal.

faqs.q: Does the Sausage McMuffin have trans fats?
faqs.a: Typically 0 g trans fat in the standard McDonald's recipe.
